metadata.description: Freelance designer Junichi and businessman Harumi are lovers and live together. But in their everyday life， they fight over the smallest things. Sex has smoothed out a lot of those fights but it has its limits! So the two break up， but... In addition to the "First meeting" extra story， there are short stories with the theme "Tutor" and "Policeman"!
metadata.name: This Love Ain't So Bad (Yaoi Manga)
